Others: India vs Canada Highlights, T20 World Cup 2024: IND vs CAN abandoned due to wet outfield in Lauderhill
With the result India have finished on top of Group A in the T20 World Cup 2024 and have qualified for the Super Eight stage alongside the United States

The IND vs CAN game is the third time a match has been abandoned at this venue. Sri Lanka’s match against Nepal was also washed out while Pakistan were eliminated on Saturday due to the match between USA and Ireland not taking place.
As it stands, Australia, West Indies, Afghanistan, and South Africa will join India and USA in the Super 8s while two more spots are up for the grabs –- one each in Group B and D.
